name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies 🥗
description: Say hello to your new favorite snack: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies! These chewy, flavorful treats are packed with oats, raisins, and a hint of cinnamon for a delightful twist on a classic cookie.
instructions: Mix unsweetened applesauce (or mashed avocado, mashed banana, olive oil), maple syrup, egg, and vanilla extract.
Add in flour, cinnamon, and salt. Mix until combined.
Fold in old-fashioned rolled oats and raisins until mixed.
Scoop mix onto a oil sprayed baking tray.
